author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/rematch/

Season 2 has officially kicked off: new gameplay upgrades, VR arenas, and festive chaos land straight into Rematch.

And this is just the opening move. The heavy hitters are still warming up:
1v1 Duels and the explosive return of the Fireball Mode will arrive later this season, ready to turn rivalries into highlights.

Grab your squad, hit the pitch, and make some noise. Season 2 starts now!

Holiday Bonus: Tis the season to score on a budget - up to 33% off Rematch on all platforms! 

#ps5 #ps5games #rematch
title: Rematch - Season 2 Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/saros/

Step behind the scenes to highlight one of the pillars of the SAROS universe: its characters. This latest trailer marks the first time Housemarque shows a deeper look at the ensemble cast: the faces, voices, and performances anchoring the story of SAROS.

SAROS is coming to PS5® on April 30, 2026. Pre-order now.

#ps5 #ps5games 

Rating Pending
title: Saros - Bringing Our Characters to Life | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10016383

Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection pulses in on March 27, 2026 for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4!

Pre-order now to get four bonus musical arrangements as well as Geo Stelar (Casual Wear) and Omega-Xis characters for your Main Menu!

Note: Pre-order bonuses may become available through other means in the future.

Look forward to new upgrades and customizable features like:
- Autosaving
- Camera Panning
- Speed Boost
- Screen Layout
- Encounter Rate
- Mega Buster Power
- Damage Reduction
- HP Recovery After Battle
...and more!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #megaman
title: Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection - Pre-order Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
